jobs.create_job_queue: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS job_queue (job_id CHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, worker_id CHAR(36), status CHAR(8) NOT NULL, submit_time DATETIME(2), finish_time DATETIME(2), result CHAR(64))
jobs.insert_job: INSERT IGNORE INTO job_queue (job_id, status, submit_time) VALUES (?)
jobs.update_job: UPDATE job_queue SET status=?, finish_time=?, result=? WHERE job_id=?
jobs.delete_jobs: DELETE IGNORE FROM job_queue WHERE (job_id) IN (?)

workers.create_worker_queue: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS worker_queue (worker_id CHAR(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, ip_addr CHAR(16) NOT NULL, status CHAR(8) NOT NULL)
workers.insert_worker: INSERT IGNORE INTO worker_queue (worker_id, ip_addr, status) VALUES (?)
